page.title: 14Homes
page.content: Most of the house building dates from after 1950, although there was a little before then. Most of the homes are owned by the families that live in them.They vary from small bungalows to large four-bedroomed houses.Many of the buldings are detached,with spacious gardens.The asking price for a four-bedroomed house or bungalow is about one hundred thousand pounds, as the area is considered a pleasant one, and it is very well-placed to travel by road, using the M 1, and M 25, when it is finished.
